text: mariyu yudulu ujair allah kumarudani antaru. Mariyu kraistavulu masih (kristu) allah kumarudani. Ivi varu tama notito ane matale. Intaku purvapu satyatiraskarulu palikina matalane varu anukaristunnaru. Allah varini nasimpajeyugaka! Varenta mosagimpabadutunnaru (satyam nundi maralimpa badutunnaru)
